content:
Faculty Council of the Student Council (abbreviated as WRSS WH) is part of the University Council of the Student Government of the AGH University of Science and Technology.
We are the only organization authorized to represent the student community of the Faculty of Humanities at AGH.
You can become a member of the student government by submitting your candidacy in the general elections organized by the Faculty Student Electoral Commission of the Faculty of Humanities.
WRSS WH offers both action-based and permanent volunteering, which can be used to fulfill student internships at the Faculty of Humanities at AGH.

summary:
Faculty Council of the Student Council (abbreviated as WRSS WH) is part of the University Council of the Student Government of the AGH University of Science and Technology.
We are the only organization authorized to represent the student community of the Faculty of Humanities at AGH.
You can become a member of the student government by submitting your candidacy in the general elections organized by the Faculty Student Electoral Commission of the Faculty of Humanities.
title: About us

content:
We Have Great Reach Our social media platforms on Instagram and Facebook are followed by the majority of students from the Faculty of Humanities, and they rely on these platforms for information about student life.
Creativity is Our Domain Creative workshops, handmade gadgets, and events no one else would think of â€“ that’s our specialty.
We Are Effective No event is impossible, and no problem is too big to overcome. We are community-minded individuals who, by working together with AGH students and staff, can tackle any obstacle.
Our Reach Instagram: 250 people
Facebook: 830 people
Mailing List: 700 people
AGH Audience Reach: 20,000 people
Want to reach WH students?
We successfully connect with the students of our faculty. Our Facebook posts are regularly followed by hundreds of people.
We have frequently helped companies showcase themselves at the faculty during various events and training sessions, allowing many students to find their first internships or jobs.
We warmly invite you to collaborate with us at future events!
Our Flagship Projects Plant Day Plant Day 2024 is a pilot event offering the AGH Faculty of Humanities community the opportunity to learn about the benefits of growing plants at home. We are open to bartering and sponsorships related to promoting environmental protection and sustainable consumption practices.
Faculty Parties at Klub Studio We organize faculty parties in collaboration with other Faculty Student Councils and the Academica Foundation. We are open to hosting themed events and sponsored parties.
Welcome Pack for First-Year Students We prepare environmentally sustainable welcome packs for first-year students to help them settle into a new city and promote responsible, healthy living in KrakÃ³w. We welcome the inclusion of promotional materials and discount codes tailored to our students.
For more projects and collaborations, check out the Projects section.
Contact Us and We Will Get Back with a Collaboration Proposal Go to the Contact section.
summary:
We Have Great Reach Our social media platforms on Instagram and Facebook are followed by the majority of students from the Faculty of Humanities, and they rely on these platforms for information about student life.
Creativity is Our Domain Creative workshops, handmade gadgets, and events no one else would think of â€“ that’s our specialty.
We Are Effective No event is impossible, and no problem is too big to overcome. We are community-minded individuals who, by working together with AGH students and staff, can tackle any obstacle.

content:
We are a group of students at the Faculty of Humanities (WH) who have resolved many crises. We regularly engage in conversations with faculty, administration, and the authorities of both the Faculty and the University.
If you need support or advice, feel free to contact the appropriate person or unit at AGH. However, if you feel uncertain or unsure of your situation, consult with WRSS.
People Who Can Help Faculty of Humanities Student Educational Advisor (WSDD) Krzysztof Stawarz
C-7, 6th floor, room 6.22 (by appointment only)
krzysztof.stawarz@samorzad.agh.edu.pl
Vice Dean for Student Affairs WH Dr. habil. Dariusz Wojakowski
C-7, 5th floor, room 5.15
wojakowski@agh.edu.pl
+48 885 953 557
AGH Student Ombudsman Agnieszka Zatyka-Szlachcic
C-1/C-2 connector, room 127
azsz@agh.edu.pl or rps@agh.edu.pl
+48 885 956 765
AGH Equality Ombudsman Artur Lesner
A-0, 3rd floor, room 334a
rzecznikrownosci@agh.edu.pl or lesner@agh.edu.pl
+48 12 617 58 07
